armorHud.configScreen.title: BerdinskiyBear's Armor HUD mod config
armorHud.configScreen.setting.anchor.des:
Place that the HUD widget is attached to.
%1$s places widget at the top in the middle.
%2$s places widget at the upper corner on the preferred side.
%3$s places widget at the bottom corner on the preferred side.
%4$s places the widget to the side from your hotbar.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.side.name: Side
armorHud.configScreen.setting.side.descr:
Side on which widget is shown.
If widget is anchored at the top in the middle this setting does nothing.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offhandSlo:
This setting defines the way widget reacts to offhand slot and attack indicator if it is at the hotbar.
Setting does nothing unless widget is anchored at the hotbar.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offsetX.de: Offsets widget position on a horizontal axis. Positive numbers moves away from anchor point, negative numbers move widget onto the anchor point.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offsetY.de: Offsets widget position on a vertical axis, otherwise the same as X offset.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.widgetShow:
This setting defines when slots of the HUD widget are shown.
%1$s slots are always shown.
%2$s shows all slots if at least one of the armor slots is not empty.
%3$s shows only slots that are not empty
armorHud.configScreen.setting.reversed.d: Reverses order of armor items in the slots of the widget.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.iconsShown: Shows special icons in empty slots.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.warningSho: If enabled, a small warning will appear at the slot of the item with low durability.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.minDurabil: If durability value is equal or lower than this setting, a warning can be shown.
If durability is equal or below this percentage, a warning can be shown.
